plot: An old man has been fixing rims for all his life. He's the one of a few people doing this job in the constantly changing Warsaw. Cheerful and humorous film presents the man who is devoted to his passion.
title: Felgarz z Woli
plot_es: An old man has been fixing rims for all his life. He's the one of a few people doing this job in the constantly changing Warsaw. Cheerful and humorous film presents the man who is devoted to his passion.

produce.name: Andrzej Wajda Master School of Film Directing
